content: {"locationId": "7146", "organizationId": "6067", "name": "Exeter Area Food Pantry", "address1": "Exeter School District Administration Building", "address2": "200 Elm St", "city": "Reading", "state": "PA", "zipCode": "19606", "country": null, "phone": "610-572-2344", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "40.3219105", "longitude": "-75.8609593", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "ZIP CODE:  19508, 19606", "languages": "English, Spanish", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "The mission of the Exeter Area Food Pantry is to provide supplemental food and assistance to our neighbors and friends in the 19606 and 19508 zip codes.  We are neighbors helping neighbors to make a better community.", "notes": "Policy Change:  If you live in 19606 or 19508 zip code and you are NEW  to pantry you will need to call 610-572-2344 to set up an appointment time. Neighbors that do not have an appointment time,  will be asked to return at 5:15.  Please call at least one day prior to day of food distribution, phone calls cannot be returned on the day of distribution.   We have limited waiting space, so for the safety of neighbors and volunteers we ask that you do not arrive before your assigned time.  If you are new to our pantry please call 610-572-2344 and leave your name and phone number, someone will call you back.  If you are a current neighbor and need to know your time please call 610-572-2344 and press 3 for a listing of arrival times.", "contactName": "Exeter Area Food Pantry", "contactPhone": "610-572-2344", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Client Choice, Dietary Menu Options, Indoor Service, Lifting / Carrying Assistance, Reservations, Senior Box Program, TEFAP Program", "dietRestrictions": "Gluten Free, Vegetarian", "foodOfferings": "Dairy, Eggs, Fruits & Vegetables, Meat, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods, Toiletries / Hygiene Products", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 53, "regionName": "Helping Harvest Fresh Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "165e31c6-81ea-4cc6-b538-5a2e6d74bb62.png", "website": "https://helpingharvest.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Eastern Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "ET", "offsetHours": "-4", "schedules": ["Friday 1:00 PM-5:30 PM [ 3rd week(s)]"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
